name: The Lost Soul
description: The Lost Soul is an arcade difficulty-focused platformer , made in a minimalist style. 13 different levels, each of which contain it’s own unique soundtrack, checkpoint system, as well as many secrets.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 64 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
